    Description
    BlackoutComponent
     
    CameraComponent
     
    CombatStatsComponent
    Component used to store information related to combat such as health, attack, etc.
    Component
    Core component class from which all components inherit.
    ComponentType
    Internal type system for components.
    DialogComponent
    This component shows a dialog box with entity image at the bottom left of the game area.
    EscapeScreenInputComponent
    A component that handles pressing of the Escape key so the user can go back to the previous screen.
    MenuExitComponent
    Add a button at the bottom left to exit to the main menu.
    NameComponent
    A component to give an entity a name, this is useful for listing out all spawned entities.
    TouchAttackComponent
    When this entity touches a valid enemy's hitbox, deal damage to them and apply a knockback.
